org.epochx.ge.op.mutation
Class PointMutation

java.lang.Object
  org.epochx.op.ConfigOperator<GEModel>
      org.epochx.ge.op.mutation.PointMutation
All Implemented Interfaces:
GEMutation, ConfigListener, Listener, Mutation, Operator
public class PointMutation
extends ConfigOperator<GEModel>
implements GEMutation

This class performs a simple point mutation on a GECandidateProgram.

Each codon in the program's chromosome is considered for mutation, with the probability of that codon being mutated given as an argument to the PointMutation constructor. If the codon does undergo mutation then a replacement codon is generated using the CodonGenerator specified in the model.

Field Summary
static Stat MUT_POINTS
          Requests a List<Integer> which is a list of the points modified as a result of the point mutation operation.

MUT_POINTS

public static final Stat MUT_POINTS
Requests a List<Integer> which is a list of the points modified as a result of the point mutation operation.

Constructor Detail

PointMutation

public PointMutation(CodonGenerator codonGenerator,
                     RandomNumberGenerator rng,
                     double pointProbability)
Constructs a PointMutation with all the necessary parameters given.

PointMutation

public PointMutation(GEModel model)
Construct a point mutation with a default point probability of 0.01. It is generally recommended that the PointMutation(GEModel, double) constructor is used instead.

Parameters:
model - The current controlling model. Parameters such as the codon generator to use will come from here.

PointMutation

public PointMutation(GEModel model,
                     double pointProbability)
Construct a point mutation with user specified point probability.

Parameters:
model - The current controlling model. Parameters such as the codon generator to use will come from here.
pointProbability - The probability each codon in a selected program has of undergoing a mutation. 1.0 would result in all nodes being changed, and 0.0 would mean no codons were changed. A typical value would be 0.01.
Method Detail

onConfigure

public void onConfigure()
Description copied from class: ConfigOperator
Configures the operator with parameters from the model. This method will be called at the appropriate times to configure this component. Implementing classes should override this method to setup the operator with any parameters required from the model. If no model is set then this instance will not be subscribed to configure events and so alternative means must be used to configure it.

Specified by:
onConfigure in interface ConfigListener
Overrides:
onConfigure in class ConfigOperator<GEModel>

mutate

public GECandidateProgram mutate(CandidateProgram p)
Perform point mutation on the given GECandidateProgram. Each codon in the program's chromosome is considered in turn, with each having the given probability of actually being exchanged. Given that a codon is chosen then a new codon is generated using the model's CodonGenerator to replace it.

Specified by:
mutate in interface GEMutation
Specified by:
mutate in interface Mutation
Parameters:
p - The GECandidateProgram selected to undergo this mutation operation.
Returns:
A GECandidateProgram that was the result of a point mutation on the provided GECandidateProgram.

getPointProbability

public double getPointProbability()
Returns the currently set probability of each codon undergoing mutation.

Returns:
a value between 0.0 and 1.0 inclusive which is the probability that a codon will undergo mutation.

setPointProbability

public void setPointProbability(double pointProbability)
Sets the probability that each codon considered undergoes mutation.

Parameters:
pointProbability - The probability each codon in a selected program has of undergoing a mutation. 1.0 would result in all nodes being changed, and 0.0 would mean no codons were changed. A typical value would be 0.01.

getRNG

public RandomNumberGenerator getRNG()
Returns the random number generator that this initialiser is using or null if none has been set.

Returns:
the rng the currently set random number generator.

setRNG

public void setRNG(RandomNumberGenerator rng)
Sets the random number generator to use. If a model has been set then this parameter will be overwritten with the random number generator from that model on the next configure event.

Parameters:
rng - the random number generator to set.

getCodonGenerator

public CodonGenerator getCodonGenerator()
Returns the codon generator that this mutation is using to provide new codons.

Returns:
the codonGenerator the CodonGenerator that is providing each new codon.

setCodonGenerator

public void setCodonGenerator(CodonGenerator codonGenerator)
Sets the codon generator that this mutation should use to obtain new codons.

Parameters:
codonGenerator - the codonGenerator to use in generating new codons for the new candidate programs.
